column5: i just recently bought a trailer and the owner had lost the ownership, he did write me a bill of sale claiming it was homemade. How difficult would it be to obtain a ownership and trailer plates
Simple.  Go to the MTO and pick one up   They can write you a new ownership and give you plates.
the previous owner can go in and replace the ownership with his information.  For mine, I had to do the "oath of declaration"... to swear that the trailer is mine. It costs $35.
thanks guys i was hoping it wouldnt be too difficult
